Text: You should specify if it's the AMD64 version or the Intel64 version.

AMD 64 and Intel 64 are the same except for Intel Itanium server processors. If you have one of those, you almost certainly know.

This image is exactly the same you get when choosing ubuntu-13.04-desktop-amd64.iso from ubuntu.com
